description.default: Retrievies information like model, size and operational status.
description.en-us: Retrievies information like model, size and operational status.
description.cs-cz: Získá informace o modelu, velikosti a o provozním stavu.

definition.commandBlock: Invoke-Command {{ComputerName}} -Credential $CredentialObject -ScriptBlock { Get-Disk {{Number}} | Select-Object Number, FriendlyName, OperationalStatus, @{n='Size';e={[math]::Round($_.Size / 1GB)}} | ConvertTo-Json -Compress }

description.default: Retrievies information like model, size and operational status.

definition.commandBlock: Invoke-Command {{ComputerName}} -Credential $CredentialObject -ScriptBlock { Get-Disk {{Number}} | Select-Object Number, FriendlyName, OperationalStatus, @{n='Size';e={[math]::Round($_.Size / 1GB)}} | ConvertTo-Json -Compress }
